title: Can I change admin user on my phone...I have a back up xl3 and it has my 2nd sim in it
content: I have  my older  XL3 64 with my user  settings as a backup setup if needed when I upgraded to 128 XL3... Can I change the admin somehow on that phone without deleting my profile to use my  other user account I have...I have a second # and sim in it to use I like as a admin.......thank you
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
